reviewText: Earth School is a simple yet thorough illustration of what really matters in life.  The video is interesting to watch with beautiful images and the content is easy to follow and very eloquent.  I would recommend this DVD for anyone young or old who craves reminders of what life is really all about.
Earth School provides a great message of hope and encouragement. It gives the viewer an interesting perspective of why we are here...

When i watched Earth School, i was deeply touched and moved. I was brought into a great spritual sensation and it is a great loving movie for familys. Earch School is great for kids to watch because it will help them learn and understand at a younger age. Earch School is great for everyone and i advise that you watch it.

Earth School is an amazing message.  Miss Bay has a unique way of sharing a beautiful message - one that comforts and gives peace - that leaves the listener full of love.  An absolute must for all families.

When you watch this movie about spirituality and life, it makes perfect sense.  I cry everytime I see it because it just touches a part of you that can only be touched when you realize the missing puzzle piece.  I recommend this dvd to anyone who is interested in understanding a little more about life and it's twists.
